title: Unboxing Toukiden Kiwami Limited Edition :: PS VITA ::  Toukiden PS4

media:group.media:title: Unboxing Toukiden Kiwami Limited Edition :: PS VITA ::  Toukiden PS4
media:group.media:description:
Let's Go Monster Hunting - in Toukiden style, with Tenko!

All background music is from the Toukiden Japan LE OST.

==================================
The HAMLET Quote
‘To sleep, perchance to dream,’ is one of the many often quoted lines in Hamlet’s ‘To be or not to be‘ soliloquy in act 3, scene 1 of Shakespeare’s play, Hamlet.

To die, to sleep—
To sleep—perchance to dream. Ay, there’s the rub!
For in that sleep of death what dreams may come,
When we have shuffled off this mortal coil,
Must give us pause—there’s the respect
That makes calamity of so long life.
==================================

Please note that due to problems now with recording certain games on PS4, there is no original sound with my Kiwami footage - I used music from the OST instead.

The article by kresnik258
"10 PlayStation Vita sales success stories"
https://kresnik258gaming.wordpress.com/2018/11/19/10-playstation-vita-sales-success-stories/

Toukiden Kiwami and Toukiden 2 are rated T (for Teen) by the ESRB. Toukiden 2 is rated PEGI 16 for EU and M (for Mature) for NZ . My video is therefore NOT suitable for children as per the COPPA legislation.

#Toukiden #Tenko #Toukiden2 #MonsterHunting
